mutants.original_line: return all(vowel in word for vowel in vowels)
mutants.mutated_line: return all((vowel not in word for vowel in vowels))

mutants.original_line: return any(word.lower().count(vowel) > 1 for vowel in vowels)
mutants.mutated_line: return any((word.lower().count(vowel) >= 1 for vowel in vowels))

mutants.mutated_line: return any((word.lower().count(vowel) <= 1 for vowel in vowels))

mutants.mutated_line: return any((word.lower().count(vowel) != 1 for vowel in vowels))

mutants.mutated_line: return any((word.lower().count(vowel) > 2 for vowel in vowels))

mutants.mutated_line: return any((word.lower().count(vowel) > 0 for vowel in vowels))
